verses.roman:
sei rātre devālaye karila śayana
śeṣa-rātri haile purī dekhila svapana

synonyms: sei rātre—on that night; deva-ālaye—in the temple; karila—did; śayana—sleeping; śeṣa-rātri—at the end of the night; haile—when it was; purī—Mādhavendra Purī; dekhila—saw; svapana—a dream.
translation: Mādhavendra Purī took rest that night in the temple, but toward the end of the night he had another dream.
